subject: Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Axel Teichmann of Germany and Marit Bjorgen won the season-opening distance races at a World Cup cross-country ski meet yesterday in Beitostolen, Norway.Teichmann covered the men’s 15-kilometer freestyle event in 36 minutes 31.1 seconds, beating Lukas Bauer of the Czech Republic by 6.3 seconds. Anders Sodergren of Sweden was third, 31.3 seconds back.Bjorgen, of Norway, won the women’s race, beating Vibeke Skofterud by 20.3 seconds.Bjorgen, a former two-time overall champion, finished in 26:16.3 for her 29th World Cup victoryh.
